info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Jackson County through 330 PM EDT... At 259 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southeast of Sylva, or 6 miles southwest of B.R. Parkway-Balsam Gap To Black Balsam Area, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tuckasegee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
